items.text: flatter one on middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: skids back in, keeps a touch low, pulled to deep square
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, 1 run

items.text: makes room and lofts this inside-out to long-off where Sabbir puts down a chance on the dive. Was a split-second late to react. Dropped
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: dropped again, another life for Stirling! Three grabs at point but couldn't hold on. Saifuddin the fielder
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, no run

items.text: eased with the spin to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: skids one through to beat the outside edge, played for the turn when there was none
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Porterfield, no run

items.text: hit on the pad as he attempts an audacious reverse sweep
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Porterfield, no run

items.text: turns this wide of midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Porterfield, 1 run

items.text: gets well forward and defends
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, no run

items.text: slider back in from around the stumps, makes room and bunts into the covers
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: fetches the sweep from outside off, straight to short fine
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: eased wide of cover for a quick single
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, 1 run

items.text: worked with the spin into the gap at square leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: drifting into middle and leg, tucked to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: slashed, but this one lands short of short third man. Deceived him in the air
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: drives but this one rolls off a thickish inside edge to short midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, no run

items.text: eased down to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: makes room and slaps this into the gap between cover and mid-off. Too short, enough flight, sat up nicely.
items.postText: Porterfield's highest in his last 15 innings
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Porterfield, FOUR runs

items.text: calls two, but will get just one. Tossed up on middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Porterfield, 1 run

items.text: punches to long-off for an easy single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: lunges forward to flick, gets a leading edge that rolls to cover
items.postText: Sreshth jumps back in for the next six
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Porterfield, no run

items.text: full, on leg, and flicked to deep backward square
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: full, wide outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to meet the ball. Mistimes the drive to cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, no run

items.text: length ball, on off, and he mistimes a back-foot punch to long on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Porterfield, 1 run

items.text: full, on off, and driven with the bat's closed face to mid-on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Stirling, no run
